here is the exports:
export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$CUDA_HOME/lib:/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-7.5/lib" export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$CUDA_HOME/lib:$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH" export PATH="$CUDA_HOME/bin:$PATH"

body:
I shall try disabling SIP soon.
here is the exports:
`export CUDA_HOME=/usr/local/cuda
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH:$CUDA_HOME/lib:/Developer/NVIDIA/CUDA-7.5/lib"
export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH="$CUDA_HOME/lib:$DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH"
export PATH="$CUDA_HOME/bin:$PATH"
`

Also dtruss is saying this:

> dtrace: failed to execute python: dtrace cannot control executables signed with restricted entitlements
